posts.post_title: FS (Another reduction) - T206 Mathewson P150 - SGC 3
posts.post_content: Another reduction - For sale a T206 Mathewson P150 - SGC 3  $1775 venmo no fee or $1830 pp gs.  Price includes priority shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  NC residents must add 6.5% ST.
